SELECT product.id AS id, product.NAME AS NAME, product.price AS price, product.url AS url FROM biz_product product WHERE id NOT IN ( SELECT product_id FROM biz_buy WHERE user_id = #{userId} ) AND state = #{prodStateCode} ORDER BY id ASC

SELECT product.id AS id, product.NAME AS NAME, product.price AS price, product.url AS url, buy.num AS num FROM biz_product AS product LEFT JOIN ( SELECT product_id, SUM( num ) AS num, COUNT( product_id ) FROM biz_buy GROUP BY product_id ) AS buy ON buy.product_id = product.id ORDER BY id ASC
